title: Express & Standard Delivery
desc: We deliver parcels within 24–72 hours in Dhaka, Chittagong, Sylhet, Khulna, and Rajshahi.

title: Nationwide Delivery
desc: We deliver parcels nationwide with home delivery in every district within 48–72 hours.

title: Fulfillment Solution
desc: We offer customized services with inventory management, order processing, packing & support.

title: E-commerce Delivery
desc: Fast & secure delivery for online shops with COD support in all major districts.

title: Corporate Delivery
desc: Business parcels, documents & bulk shipments delivered with premium support.

title: International Shipping
desc: Door-to-door worldwide shipping with customs clearance assistance.
